predicate.note: Frames file for 'fund' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus and comparison with 'finance.' No verbnet entry.

roleset.name: provide money for, get money for

example.name: active
example.text: [Cray Research]-1 did not want *trace*-1 to fund a project that did not include Seymour.
example.arg: a project that did not include Seymour.

example.name: passive, with instrument (money)
example.text: [The contributions]-1 were funded *trace*-1 by monthly payments of $1,000 to $2,000 to Appleyard.
example.arg: by monthly payments of $1,000 to $2,000 to Appleyard.

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Of the proceeds, [$500 million]-1 will be used *trace*-1 to fund its tender offer.

example.name: all args
example.text: Orkem, France's third-largest chemical group, said it would fund the acquisition through internal resources.
